triples.name: Proximal Policy Optimization
triples.relevance: PPO is the base algorithm that Independent PPO (IPPO) extends; the paper analyzes IPPO as an alternative to joint value function approaches.

triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: The paper addresses cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning, a core component of the research problem.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning is the foundational framework within which the paper's multi-agent approach operates.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: PPO is a policy gradient method; the paper uses policy gradient principles in its comparative analysis.

triples.name: StarCraft
triples.relevance: SMAC (StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge) is the benchmark environment used to evaluate IPPO's performance.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper applies deep RL techniques with neural network policies in the multi-agent context.

triples.name: Independent learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes and demonstrates that Independent PPO (IPPO), a form of independent learning where each agent estimates its local value function, performs competitively or better than state-of-the-art joint learning approaches.
